headline.main: SPRING OFFENSIVES OPEN WITH PLAY FOR POSITION; War of Nerves in Balkans and Far East Heralds Decisive Operations, but Britain Is Still Chief Theatre

lead_paragraph: The Spring campaigns opened last week as Bulgaria joined the Axis powers and Germany, Italy and Great Britain mobilized their strength for the impending, and possibly decisive, operations of 1941. The war of bullets and the war of nerves continued on all fronts, but for the moment the Balkans, where the Reich won a diplomatic victory in Bulgaria, was the most important theatre of action.
abstract: Axis press to start new anti-U S campaign
